description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions. Use RFMIP specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, radiative transfer, clear sky, offline, present day, RCP8.5, pre-industrial
long_name: Offline assessment of radiative transfer parmaeterizations in clear skies
rationale: Assess radiative forcing by specific agents and probing sources of parameterisation error.  Clear sky calculations for a set of prescribed atmospehric conditions to identify the degree to which errors in radiative transfer contribute to diverstiy in estimates of instantaneous radiative forcing and how this error depends on the background state of the atmosphere and on the forcing itself.
